title: Red Brick Pizza - Ventura
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizza franchise that uses many organic and local produce, plus bio-degradable paper products, and offers filtered water for guests. Offers a separate menu for vegetarian and vegan dishes with vegan cheese option (call to check if in-stock). Has gluten free options. The lounge features recycled barn wood for table tops and menu boards. Free Wi-Fi.
